flawed_nl_solution:
Matthias has 40-30 = <<40-30=10>>10 soccer balls without holes.
Matthias has 15-7 = <<15-7=8>>8 basketballs without holes.
A total of 10+8 = <<10+8=81>>81 balls do not have holes.
#### 81

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 18, not 81. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
